translation.en: [ Man Narrating ] The future--
The polar ice caps have melted, covering the earth with water.
translation.fr: Les pôles ont fondu. La Terre est recouverte d´eau.

translation.en: Those who survived have adapted...
translation.fr: Les survivants se sont adaptés à un monde nouveau.

translation.en: to a new world.
translation.fr: se sont adaptés à un monde nouveau.

translation.en: Bad luck, English.
translation.fr: Il y a des trous énormes. Pas de chance, l´Anglais.

translation.en: But the Slavers are producing a good grade of poxy these days.
translation.fr: Les Slavers font de la bonne résine.

translation.en: Cost you a handful of dirt. Or maybe that wind chime.
translation.fr: Ça te coûtera un peu de terre ou ce mobile.

translation.en: - What are you doin' here? - Just waiting.
Take your hand off the sail.
translation.fr: Ote tes mains de la voile !

translation.en: I've seen your boat before. Haven't seen you.
translation.fr: J´ai déjà vu ce bateau mais pas toi.

translation.en: Took it legal.
Previous owner was dead on the tiller when I found it.
translation.fr: Son propriétaire était mort à la barre.

translation.en: You had another hour before I traded up again.
translation.fr: Une heure de plus et je l´échangeais pour le tien.

translation.en: [ Laughing ] Just improving my means.
translation.fr: Une heure de plus et je l´échangeais pour le tien. J´améliore mes moyens.

translation.en: Well, I owe you then. No, thanks.
I got all the supplies I need. Just came from an atoll.
translation.fr: J´ai tout ce qu´il me faut. Je viens d´un atoll,

translation.en: Eight days east, if you're interested.
translation.fr: à huit jours vers l´est, si ça t´intéresse.

translation.en: - Two drifters meet, something needs to be exchanged. - I know the code.
translation.fr: Deux Drifters doivent faire du troc. Je connais le code mais l´information est gratuite.

translation.en: But I'll give you this one for free.
translation.fr: Je connais le code mais l´information est gratuite.

translation.en: Nothing's free in Waterworld.
Smokers. Just enough wind to get away clean.
translation.fr: Des Smokers ! Il y a assez de vent pour s´échapper.

translation.en: [ Drifter ] Forget the bag.
It's not worth it. You'll never make it with your sails down.
translation.fr: Tu n´y arriveras pas avec tes voiles affalées.

translation.en: What can I say? [ Laughing ]
- Joe, he's goin' for it. - What the hell?
Never seen that before.
Here we go! Go! Drive! Drive!
Faster! Faster! Whoo!
Come on! He's gonna get it! He's gonna get it!
translation.fr: Il va l´attrapper, il va l´attrapper!

translation.en: Inbound! Straight out from the gates.

translation.en: English.
Flag's down, drifter. We got enough traders.
translation.fr: Le pavillon est baissé, Drifter. On a assez de marchands.

translation.en: Dirt.
Open the gates!
[ Man ] Bones to berries. Veins to vine.
translation.fr: Les os en compost, les veines pour les plantes,

translation.en: These tendon to trees. This blood to brine.
translation.fr: les tendons aux arbres, le sang en saumure.

translation.en: Too old she was.
This woman does leave us, recycled and enshrined...

translation.en: in the presence of him who leads us.
translation.fr: enchâssée, en présence de Celui qui nous guide.

translation.en: You know me?
I know what you are.
Good. Then you know if you look for trouble while you're here, you'll find more than you can handle.
translation.fr: Alors si tu cherches des problèmes, tu sais que tu seras servi.

translation.en: You got two hours.
I'll only need one.
Me. You each get one... if everything's here when I get back.
translation.fr: Vous en aurez chacun un si à mon retour tout est là.

translation.en: Pure dirt. [ People Murmuring ]
Three point two kilos.
How'd you come by so much of it?
translation.fr: Où tu as trouvé tout ça ?

translation.en: Another atoll, 30 horizons west of here.
translation.fr: Sur un atoll à trente horizons d´ici.

translation.en: Where'd they get it?
They didn't say. [ Man ] We heard about that place--
translation.fr: Ils ne m´ont rien dit. On connaît cet endroit.

translation.en: heard they was all killed.
- That's why they didn't say. - Smokers?
Maybe Smokers, maybe Slavers.
So what's the word? We tradin' or not?
translation.fr: Combien ? On fait affaire ou pas ?

translation.en: We'll tally it like, uh, pure hydro.
translation.fr: Ça correspond à... de l´hydro pure.

translation.en: Works out to... 62 chits.
I want twice that.
I just want one sip of hydro. No, not till you tell me.
translation.fr: Juste une gorgée d´hydro. Parle d´abord.

translation.en: She got inkings on her back. I seen her.
translation.fr: Elle a un tatouage dans le dos.

translation.en: They say if you read the marks on the child,
translation.fr: On dit que celui qui le déchiffrera

translation.en: they'll lead ya all the way to Dryland.
Dryland's a myth. Some still believe.
translation.fr: Dryland est un mythe. Certains y croient. Même les Smokers s´intéressent à elle.

translation.en: They say the Smokers even got an eye out for her.
translation.fr: Certains y croient. Même les Smokers s´intéressent à elle.

translation.en: Well, then, we better keep it to ourselves.
translation.fr: Alors, il vaut mieux garder ça pour nous.

translation.en: - Help you? - Yeah.
Where's the store? You found it.
You don't have much.
You the man with the dirt?
- One more. - Make it two.
A man this rich will buy for a fellow outwater, I'm sure.

translation.en: One.
That's an interesting pair of boots you got.
Trade? No.
Shame.
Enola. Hey, what are you doing?
No, you can't have it. I need another piece. I want to draw some more.
translation.fr: Non, arrête. J´en ai besoin pour dessiner.

translation.en: I'll get it to you. Just stay in the back.
With all those chits, you could order up a bath. Have you ever had a freshwater bath?
translation.fr: Avec cet argent, tu pourrais te payer un bain.

translation.en: Why are you talkin' to me? Just being friendly.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu me parles ? Pour faire connaissance.

translation.en: - Is that a tomato plant? - Yeah.
You have a keen eye.
Saw one in a picture. How much?
translation.fr: J´en ai vu en image. Combien ?

translation.en: Half your chits.
I'll take them too. Take what?
translation.fr: Je prends ça aussi. Quoi ? Vous avez tout acheté.

translation.en: You bought everything. I'll take them shelves.
translation.fr: Quoi ? Vous avez tout acheté. Les étagères.

translation.en: So, what did you see out there in your 15 months?
translation.fr: Qu´avez-vous vu pendant ces quinze mois ?

translation.en: Such as? An end to all this water.
translation.fr: Du genre ? La fin de cette eau.

translation.en: Askin' the wrong person.
The one they buried today? Uh-huh?
She found the only end there is.
translation.fr: a trouvé la seule fin qui existe.

translation.en: I've got a proposition for you, Mariner.
translation.fr: J´ai une proposition à vous faire.

translation.en: I'm not staying. We're not asking you to. All we want is your seed.
translation.fr: Je ne reste pas. On ne vous le demande pas. On veut votre semence.

translation.en: We can look to our own for impregnation,
translation.fr: On peut se féconder entre nous.

translation.en: but too much of that sort of thing gets... undesirable.
translation.fr: Mais à force, ça engendre des effets... indésirables.

translation.en: When she's pregnant, you go on your way...
translation.fr: Dès qu´elle est enceinte, vous partez

translation.en: with all the supplies you need.
translation.fr: avec les provisions que vous voulez.

translation.en: You don't have anything. You're dying.
No man stays out that long and turns down a woman.
translation.fr: Aucun solitaire ne refuserait une femme.

translation.en: He's hiding something. Maybe he's a Smoker spy.
translation.fr: Il cache quelque chose. C´est peut-être un espion des Smokers.

translation.en: When the elders say so, you can leave... and not before.
translation.fr: Tu partiras quand les Anciens te le diront. Pas avant.

translation.en: Gills.
- Mutation! - He's a mutant!
Throw the nets!
By what right--
You pay me to keep the peace.
This isn't it.
- He has killed one of ours. - He was defending himself.
translation.fr: Il a tué l´un des nôtres. Il se défendait.

translation.en: - He needs to be destroyed! - Kill him.
That may be-- Let's kill him.
but not here and not like this.
translation.fr: Mais pas ici et pas comme ça.

It's tied. I can't get it off.
Open the gate.
Is it a map?
You'd tell me if you knew, wouldn't you, Enola? Mm-hmm.

translation.en: - What are you drawing? - I don't know.

translation.en: Helen, look. Look at the prodigal child's latest vision.
translation.fr: Helen, regarde. La dernière vision prodigieuse de cette enfant.

translation.en: How soon before we can leave?
[ Man ] Helen, I don't have any idea yet where we can go.

translation.en: I haven't figured out the tattoo on her back.

translation.en: I'm a stupid man. The answer's right there.
translation.fr: Je n´ai pas déchiffré son tatouage. Je suis un idiot. La réponse est là. Ça me dépasse.

translation.en: It's just beyond me.
translation.fr: La réponse est là. Ça me dépasse.

translation.en: Maybe he knows.
Oh, yes, I see. They are webbed.

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten digits. That's wonderful.
translation.fr: Un, deux,... dix doigts de pieds ! Prodigieux !

translation.en: They tell me too that you have gills. Isotropic gills. Are they merely vestigial or are they functional now?

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm not laughing at you. I'm excited. Your gills. They're functional.

translation.en: Ichthyus sapien. You can breathe in the water.
translation.fr: Ichthyus Sapiens. Tu respires sous l´eau.

translation.en: How deep can you go?
Look, I'm only here because I want to learn more about you.
translation.fr: Je suis venu te voir pour en savoir plus sur toi.

translation.en: You don't like humans very much, do you?
translation.fr: Les humains, tu ne les aimes pas beaucoup...

translation.en: I can't say that I blame you. But tell me--
translation.fr: Je te comprends. Toute ton espèce a aussi mauvais caractère ?

translation.en: Are all of your kind as bad-tempered as you are?

translation.en: - I have no "kind." - Oh, fish rot.
I'd be surprised if there weren't others, and if there aren't, there will be eventually.
translation.fr: Ça m´étonnerait. Et s´il n´y en a pas, il y en aura.

translation.en: Anyway, I've come here because I need to ask you a question.

To cause all this water. Hundreds-- Hundreds of years ago.

There's a mooring cleat down there. What?

translation.en: Good as any key. A mooring cleat?

translation.en: I won't hurt anyone. I'll just leave.

translation.en: - I'll be right back. - [ Man ] Gregor!
What's your business there?
Move along! I'm not a brave man.

translation.en: Don't let it die with you.

translation.en: [ Man ] Gregor! Move along!
[ Elder ] After considerable deliberation of the evidence at hand,
translation.fr: Après mûre délibération, preuves à l´appui,

translation.en: does, indeed, constitute a threat.
Therefore, in the interest of public safety,
translation.fr: Dans un souci de sécurité publique, il est donc

translation.en: I'm sorry.
Bones to berries. Veins to vines.
translation.fr: Les os en compost, les veines pour les plantes,

translation.fr: les tendons aux arbres, le sang en saumure. Trop étrange pour la vie...

recycled and entombed,
in the presence of him who leads us.

To your posts!
- Kill! - There!
We are safe behind these walls.

Let me out! I'll fight!
Give me the key to the city now.

Look!

- [ Gunfire ] - [ Gregor ] Helen, come quickly!

Helen! Enola! Helen, I'm sorry!
Shoot him. Shoot him.

Get the gate.
[ Mariner ] Hurry up!
Kamikazes. Come on!
That made a hole.
Find her! Get the girl!
Go get that guy! Go! Kill him!
- [ Mariner ] You're too slow! - Run to the other side.
[ Shrieks ] Grab on! Hold on, hold on.
It's stuck! I can't make it through!
- Let her go! - [ Gunfire Continues ]
Just drop her!
Turn the wheel. The wheel! Turn it!
That! Come on. Push it.
I am! Hurry! Now pull!
Push it! Push it hard! Push it hard!
- [ Gunfire ] - Enola, jump.
Jump. Look at me. Jump! Okay. Now!

translation.en: Hey! Can you steer?
Can I trust you?
Answer me this, somebody. Why is that boat still firin'?
What's that cousin's name? Chuck.
- Hey, Chuck! - [ Smoker Leader ] He's pulling him right into us.

translation.en: Maybe he doesn't answer to "Chuck." Call him "Charles." Charlie!
Stop him!
Adios, cousins.
She's here somewhere. Keep lookin'.
What you got? Couple of heartbeats over there. Aren't sayin' much.

translation.en: If you'll notice the arterial nature of the blood comin' from the hole in my head,

translation.en: First one that tells me lives.

translation.en: You won. Start over.
I saw a girl. I'm not sure,
but I think she got on a boat with three hulls.

translation.en: A fluke of evolution.
Oh, I'm sorry. A fluke of, uh--

No! No, you said you wouldn't kill me! Did I say that?

translation.en: You said it. Oh, I may have.
I may have.
We get to the 'Deez,

translation.en: Dryland?
You know where it is.
Yeah, I know where it is.
And, uh-- And we're going?
You and I are.
The kid we gotta pitch over the side.

You know-- I said I won't drink.
For 12 days?
No. It's better one of you dies now... than both of you die slow.

translation.en: No, you got me out so you could get out. We're even.
She can cook. She can fish.
translation.fr: Elle peut cuisiner. - Elle peut pêcher. - Moi aussi.

translation.en: So can I. Then take my necklace. Take my necklace.

translation.en: I got better ones below. No, look!
After what you went through back there on the atoll, I can understand why you would want to.

Is there something else then?
Enola! Go below.
Yeah. You said so yourself.
Been out there a long time.

translation.en: Couple hours ago, I was potential dirt to you.
We're not like that. You all are.

translation.en: You got nothin' I need.
You're taking us to Dryland.
Killing's a hard thing to do well.
- Believe me. I'm not the one to start on. - Both of us!

As long as it takes.
[ Indistinct Shouting ] Don't you touch my child! Come here! [ Indistinct Shouting ]

Oh. Oh, lookin' real good, yeah.
There. There.

Now, there may be some small problem in depth perception.

Hey, it's drivin' better.
You guys are great. Bless all you cousins over there.
Keep up the good work. Growth is progress. Growth is progress.

translation.en: Take it off!
- Yes. - Your Deaconship.

translation.fr: Deacon, mes respects ! Bonjour ou bonsoir, peu importe.

translation.en: whichever the case may be.

translation.fr: Quoi ? Je suis très occupé. Sachez qu´il nous reste exactement

four feet, nine inches of black stuff.

We'll burn through that in two lunars. Sweet Joe!
translation.fr: Ce sera brûlé en deux lunes. Qui peut me dire

We outgrowed it.
All right. The only thing that is important is the tattooed girl.
translation.fr: L´important, c´est la gamine au tatouage. On ne lésine pas

Excellent.

translation.en: You take up space, and you slow me down.
translation.fr: Vous prenez de la place et vous me ralentissez.

translation.en: You know, she's just a little girl.
translation.fr: Ce n´est qu´une petite fille. Elle ne connaît pas vos règles.

translation.en: She doesn't know your rules. You wanna stay?
translation.fr: Ce n´est qu´une petite fille. Elle ne connaît pas vos règles. Si vous voulez rester, qu´elle les apprenne !

translation.en: You teach her.
translation.fr: Si vous voulez rester, qu´elle les apprenne !

translation.en: Enola, what'd I tell you?
You're not so tough. You know that?
translation.fr: Vous n´êtes pas un vrai dur.

translation.en: How many people have you killed?
translation.fr: Vous avez tué beaucoup de gens ?

translation.en: Ten? Twenty?
You talk a lot. I talk a lot 'cause you don't talk at all.
translation.fr: Tu parles trop. Parce que vous ne parlez pas du tout. Alors, combien ?

translation.en: Now how many?
translation.fr: Parce que vous ne parlez pas du tout. Alors, combien ?

translation.en: - Including little girls? - I'm not afraid of you.
translation.fr: Y compris les fillettes ? Vous ne me faites pas peur.

translation.en: I told Helen you wouldn't be so ugly if you cut your hair.
translation.fr: Vous seriez moins laid avec les cheveux coupés.

translation.en: In fact, you talk all the time. It's like a storm when you're around. Enola.
translation.fr: Tu parles sans arrêt. Tu es une véritable tornade.

translation.en: Hey! What are you doing?
- [ Enola ] Helen! - [ Helen ] You bastard! She can't swim! Help me! Helen!
translation.fr: Ordure ! Elle ne sait pas nager !

translation.en: Oh, please, come back. Please.
Thanks. I swear,
translation.fr: Merci. Touchez encore à elle et je vous jure

translation.en: if you ever touch her again--
translation.fr: Touchez encore à elle et je vous jure

translation.en: You son of a bitch. Look at me.
translation.fr: Touchez encore à elle et je vous jure qu´un matin, vous ne vous réveillerez pas.

translation.en: You will go to bed that night, and you will never wake up.
translation.fr: qu´un matin, vous ne vous réveillerez pas.

translation.en: Shut up. What?
[ Helen ] Smokers? Yeah.
Can't we outrun them?
[ Engine Humming ] Not with my sail down.
- What are you thinkin' about? - That's a nice touch.
translation.fr: Ça va pas ? Bien joué. C´est eux.

translation.en: That's them.
Don't hit the kid.
Coward!
[ Helen ] Oh, I'm really sorry. I'm sorry. But you didn't give me much choice. Oh, I know.
translation.fr: Pardon. Vous ne m´avez pas laissé le choix.

translation.en: But you ran away. I-- What?
Don't ever touch anything on my boat again.
translation.fr: Ne touchez plus jamais à rien sur mon bateau !

translation.en: She said she was sorry!
That means you're supposed to say something back!
translation.fr: C´est tout ce que vous dites ?

translation.en: Did you say somethin'? [ Enola ] Mm-mmm.
[ Deacon ] The child-- Did he have the girl with him?
- [ Pilot ] Uh-huh. - Seems to me if we launch now, we can cut him down just about here.
translation.fr: En partant tout de suite, on le neutralisera ici.

translation.en: If he doesn't change course. Ah, it's not likely.
translation.fr: S´il garde ce cap. C´est probable.

translation.en: He's a wily one, that ichthy-demon.
translation.fr: Il est malin, ce démon aquatique.

translation.en: Yeah, if he knows he's been spotted,
he'll expect us to expect him to change course,
translation.fr: il pensera qu´on s´attend à ce qu´il change de cap.

translation.en: which is exactly why he'll keep his heading.
translation.fr: Du coup, il continuera sa route.

translation.en: The important question is-- where's he heading?
translation.fr: La question est : quel est son cap ?

translation.en: And does he know how precious his cargo is?
translation.fr: Et connaît-il la valeur de sa cargaison ?

translation.en: I say that he's headed here, and we take him here.
translation.fr: Il se dirige par là, et on le prendra ici.

translation.en: Drifter? Mm-hmm.
[ Shouting Continues ] [ Helen ] Are we gonna stop? Look at the flag! His flag's up.
translation.fr: On s´arrête ? Il a hissé son pavillon.

translation.en: I thought you all stopped for each other.
translation.fr: Vous ne devez pas vous arrêter ?

translation.en: Well, maybe he has some food!
Don't find many who follow the rules anymore.
Well, make it quick. What's your business?
Trade.
You got any resin?
[ Babbling ] You been outwater a long time, haven't you?
Must be jokin' me, man. Resin! You don't got enough.
translation.fr: Tu plaisantes. De la résine ! Tu n´as pas assez.

translation.en: How 'bout food?
translation.fr: Tu plaisantes. De la résine ! Tu n´as pas assez. Et de la nourriture ?

translation.en: Could you say that again, please?
- How 'bout food? - Ah, yeah, food.
Yeah, that'd be good, eh?
translation.fr: De la nourriture, ce serait bien.

translation.en: I haven't eaten in, well, you know, forever.
translation.fr: Je n´ai pas mangé depuis si longtemps.

translation.en: Which one of you two is a cook then?
'Cause I usually fall for the waitress. [ Chuckling ]
Like you said, I don't have much.
Now listen, eh? Let's see. What do I have to do?
We can start with that wee orchard you got over there.
translation.fr: Et ce petit arbre que tu as là-bas ?

translation.en: - [ Whooping ] - All right. Hold it there.
[ Mariner ] We can talk. [ Drifter ] Fair enough.
It's a nice rod, isn't it?
translation.fr: Elle est belle, cette canne à pêche.

translation.en: I like that rod. It's a nice rod. [ Babbles ]
translation.fr: cette canne à pêche. C´est ma préférée.

translation.en: Got yourself a wee harem goin' here now, do ya?
translation.fr: Tu t´es trouvé un petit harem ?

translation.en: What you want for the women?
We're not for sale.
Not for sale? There's no such thing as not for sale. Not for sale. Not for sale, eh?
translation.fr: Pas à vendre. Tout est à vendre. Pas à vendre !

translation.en: Are they a pair or would you consider sellin' 'em separate? No.
translation.fr: C´est un lot, ou tu les vends séparément ?

translation.en: Our business is done here unless you got some resin or sail you can part with.
translation.fr: On s´arrête là si tu n´as ni résine ni voiles.

translation.en: I told you once already, I don't have it. I-I-I don't have it. Don't have it. Don't have it.
Haven't seen neither for trade in lunars now. Wait. Wait, wait, wait.
translation.fr: Des années que j´en ai pas vu sur le marché. Attends. Attends.

translation.en: I do have somethin' that'll make you change your mind.
translation.fr: J´ai quelque chose. Tu vas changer d´avis.

translation.en: Somethin' that you can't pass on. [ Giggles ]
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas laisser passer ça.

translation.en: I took it off an Atoller refugee camp.
translation.fr: Ça vient d´un camp de réfugiés.

translation.en: The life savings of the entire clan.
translation.fr: Les économies de tout un clan.

translation.en: Paper. [ Babbles ]
It's paper. Have you ever seen paper? Look at it.
translation.fr: Tu vois ce que c´est ? Tu as déjà vu du papier comme ça ?

translation.en: Smell it.
I been savin' it for a special trade.
translation.fr: Je l´ai gardé pour une occasion spéciale.

translation.en: Don't you do it.
You know, maybe I'm talkin' to the wrong person here.
Whose boat is this? Is it your boat or your boat?
translation.fr: Ce bateau est à toi ou à elle ?

translation.en: No. No, it's his boat. But he doesn't own us.
translation.fr: Ce bateau est à lui. Mais pas nous.

translation.en: Half an hour.
translation.fr: Une demi-heure. Une demi-heure. Il est cinglé...

translation.en: [ Mumbling, Babbling ] Out of his mind somethin' there.
I got two pages in here, man. I mean, I'd get half a dozen girls with this, you know.
translation.fr: Je peux me payer six filles avec ça.

translation.en: Half an hour.
- You tradin' or not? - Don't.
Shut up.
Forty-five minutes with the wee one right there. I like to do the talkin', if you know what I mean.
translation.fr: 45 minutes avec la petite. J´aime prendre les initiatives.

translation.en: No!
No. My boat.
- Fair enough. Fair enough. Good, good, good. Aye. - Helen.
- Sit down. - Enola, just do as he says.
translation.fr: Assise ! Fais ce qu´il te dit.

translation.en: It's been a while for me now.
Guess it's been more than a while, actually.
translation.fr: Un sacré moment, à vrai dire.

translation.en: I've only got half an hour.
[ Gasps ] Ooh. You're so beautiful. Aye. Anyone ever told you that?
translation.fr: Tu es si belle. On ne te l´a jamais dit ?

translation.en: Give me that. What are you doin'? It's just a game.
translation.fr: On ne te l´a jamais dit ? Donne ! Ce n´est qu´un jeu.

translation.en: Oh, I, um-- I, uh-- We was just playin'.
The trade's off.
I changed my mind.
Well, um-- Well, you can't do that.
translation.fr: Changé d´avis ? Tu n´as pas le droit.

translation.en: I mean, a deal's a deal, eh?
I just did.
She's mine. Aye. No. No, no. I own her. But-- No.
- Go on. - Get, get, get. Go, go, go. Good, good.
translation.fr: Sauve-toi. Ne va pas trop loin.

translation.en: But don't go too far now. This won't take but a minute.
translation.fr: Ne va pas trop loin. J´en ai pour une minute.

translation.en: I hate this boat. I hate this boat!
translation.fr: Je hais ce bateau. Je hais ce bateau!

translation.en: You bastard.
You-- You're pretty stingy for a man who's got everything, aren't ya now?
translation.fr: Tu es bien radin pour un type qui a tout.

translation.en: Where's me boat?
You'd never catch anything with this. It's useless.
translation.fr: Vous n´attraperez rien avec ça. C´est inutile.

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry. You were right about the pole.
translation.fr: Je suis désolée. Vous avez raison.

translation.en: You were right, but we have to eat.
Now I know you can hear me!
Now we can fish for ourselves. You show us what to do.
translation.fr: On peut pêcher. Montrez-nous comment faire.

translation.en: You must know how. Even you've gotta eat.
You just sit there.
Happy now?
You don't like my singing, do you?
translation.fr: Vous n´aimez pas quand je chante ?

translation.en: Helen says you don't like my singing 'cause you can't sing.
translation.fr: Parce que vous ne savez pas chanter.

translation.en: - Ever try and listen? - To what?
The sound of the world.
- I don't hear anything. - That's because you're too loud,
translation.fr: Je n´entends rien. Tu fais trop de bruit. Et tu bouges sans arrêt.

translation.en: and you're movin' around all the time.
translation.fr: Tu fais trop de bruit. Et tu bouges sans arrêt.

translation.en: Try sittin' still.
Eyeball?
I wish I had feet like his.
translation.fr: Je voudrais des pieds comme les siens.

translation.en: Then maybe I could swim.
Enola.
[ Burps ] Sorry.
Never met a person couldn't swim before.
I can't.
People said I was weird.
translation.fr: Les gens disent que je suis bizarre.

translation.en: Maybe they were right.
Maybe they were right about you too.
Enola wanted to give you this.
And this.
She won't take it again.
You don't look much like her.
Well, I'm not her mother if that's what you're asking. You act like it.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas sa mère. Vous faites comme si.

translation.en: What are those marks on her back?
Nothing. They're just fanciful things.
- Like what she draws? - She draws what she sees.
translation.fr: Comme ses dessins. Elle dessine ce qu´elle voit.

translation.en: She's like a mirror.
translation.fr: C´est un miroir. Les gens de l´atoll

translation.en: People on the atoll thought she was a--
translation.fr: C´est un miroir. Les gens de l´atoll la prenaient pour...

translation.en: Freak?
Uh-huh. Yeah. I just thought she was special.
I'm not givin' it to her. It's just--
translation.fr: Je ne lui donne pas. C´est un...

translation.en: A loan.
Yeah. I'm not givin' it to her.
translation.fr: Oui. Je ne lui donne pas.

translation.en: Is Dryland beautiful?
You'll see.
Enola, what are you doing?
Those monsters'll kill her! No, they're asleep now.
translation.fr: Les monstres vont la dévorer. Ils dorment.

translation.en: Hands around my neck.
Let the water tell your arms and legs how to move.
We're goin' down. Hold your breath.
What is it? What is it?
The barter outpost.
You said we'd get to Dryland today.
Today. Tomorrow. What's it matter?
translation.fr: Aujourd´hui, on va à Dryland ! Aujourd´hui ou demain...

translation.en: I need resin.
- What is that? - It's PortuGreek. Their own language.
translation.fr: Vous voulez échanger? -C´est quoi ça ? -Du portugrec. C´est leur langue.

translation.en: Or so I thought.
There's my girl. Yeah.
Howdy, darlin'. Come on in here now.
translation.fr: Bonjour, ma chérie. Viens par ici.

translation.en: What's going on? Smokers.
He's spotted us. Sound it!
Sound it! Sound it! Sound it! Sound it!
Starboard side! Now.
Get in the chair.
Watch it. He's clearin' the net.
Go to the helm.
Get the centerboard! Centerboard?
What centerboard? I don't know what to do!
It's too late. Over here!
Gimme that rifle. Boy, if you wanna do somethin' right,
translation.fr: Passe-moi ce fusil. On n´est jamais mieux servi que par soi-même.

translation.en: you've got to do it yourself.
translation.fr: On n´est jamais mieux servi que par soi-même.

translation.en: I winged him. I say we load...
all the go-juice onto one boat and run the freak down.
You can't catch him in ten boats, and you wanna send just one?
translation.fr: Un seul, alors que tu as échoué avec dix ?

translation.en: Well, I pray that you're jokin'.
Bring me the trackers.
He's hurt.
It's not what you think. They weren't after her.
- I saw what I saw. - What?
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas aveugle. Quoi ?

translation.en: No more lies.
- [ Shrieks ] - What are the marks on her back?
People say it's the way to Dryland.
translation.fr: On dit que c´est la route pour Dryland.

translation.en: Dryland's a myth!
translation.fr: On dit que c´est la route pour Dryland. Dryland est un mythe.

translation.en: No. You said so yourself that you know where it is. You did.
translation.fr: Non ! Vous l´avez dit ! Vous savez où c´est !

translation.en: You're a fool to believe in something you've never seen before.
translation.fr: Il ne faut croire que ce qu´on voit.

translation.en: I've seen it. I've touched it! Dirt that was richer and darker than yours.
translation.fr: Je l´ai vue. Je l´ai touchée. De la terre plus riche que la vôtre.

translation.en: It was in the basket we found Enola in!
translation.fr: Dans le panier où était Enola.

translation.en: It doesn't exist! Well, how can you be so sure?
Because I've sailed farther than most have dreamed, and I've never seen it.
translation.fr: J´ai navigué plus loin que tout le monde. Je ne l´ai jamais vue.

translation.en: But the things on your boat.
"Things on my boat" what?
There are things on your boat that nobody has ever seen!
translation.fr: Ces trucs que personne n´a jamais vus.

translation.en: What are these shells?
And that reflecting glass?
translation.fr: Ces coquillages ! Ce miroir ! Et cette...

translation.en: And th-the music box? That--
Well, if not from Dryland, then where? Wh-Where?
translation.fr: Si ce n´est pas de Dryland, d´où ça vient ?

translation.en: You wanna see Dryland?
You really wanna see it?
I'll take you to Dryland.
Get in.
Well, what about Enola? There's only air for one.
Get in the water. It'll be all right.
Don't touch anything.
I didn't know.
All this time...
I didn't know.
Nobody does.
Can you get us outta here?
I'd say there are two chances o' that.
- Hey! - No way and no how.
Shoulda bought me that drink. Come on!
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû me payer à boire.

translation.en: This way. Come on!
Proper introductions first.
I'm the Deacon.
If you don't recall the face, perhaps it's 'cause I didn't always look like this.
translation.fr: Mon visage ne te dit rien ? Je n´ai pas toujours ressemblé à ça.

translation.en: I suspect she's somewhere real close.
translation.fr: Elle ne doit pas être loin.

translation.en: So we can tear this boat apart lookin' for her,
translation.fr: On peut mettre ce bateau en pièces

translation.en: but I'd rather somebody just tell me where she is.
translation.fr: mais dites-moi plutôt où elle est.

translation.en: And the first one that does that lives.
translation.fr: Le premier à parler aura la vie sauve. Le second...

translation.en: And the runner-up-- Well, actually, there are no runners-up.
translation.fr: Le premier à parler aura la vie sauve. Le second... Il n´y aura pas de second !

translation.en: Oh, sweet Joe, I love this part.
Choose 'em. One, two. Live or die.
translation.fr: A vous de choisir. Vivre ou mourir.

translation.en: You know, personally,
I'd rather shoot the sperm-of-the-devil here.
Huh? But you know somethin'?
translation.fr: descendre cette créature diabolique. Mais tu sais quoi ?

translation.en: I don't think you're gonna tell me, are ya?
translation.fr: Je crois que tu ne diras rien.

translation.en: Huh? Too bad.
translation.fr: Je crois que tu ne diras rien. Dommage.

translation.en: Come on, eh? What do you say? She's not your kind.
translation.fr: Qu´en dis-tu ? Elle n´est pas de ta race.

translation.en: You don't even have a kind.
translation.fr: Tu n´as même pas de race.

translation.en: If you say it, he'll still kill us both.
translation.fr: Il nous tuera de toutes façons.

translation.en: Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
If you don't tell me,
translation.fr: Si tu ne dis rien, par Poséidon,

translation.en: I swear to Poseidon I will torch your boat.
translation.fr: Si tu ne dis rien, par Poséidon, je mets le feu à ce bateau.

translation.en: Refresh my memory. What happens when neither one of 'em talks?
translation.fr: On fait quoi quand ils ne parlent pas ?

translation.en: Never happened before. Never happened before.
[ Sighs ] All right! If they won't tell us where she is, do 'em!
Both of 'em! Just kill 'em now! [ Fires Gun ]
translation.fr: Puisqu´ils ne disent rien, bute-les ! Tout de suite !

translation.en: So gullible! Bring her here.
- Take and ye shall receive! - [ Helen ] No! Leave her!
So ends your daily sermonette! [ Laughing ]
All we gotta do is figure out this map.
translation.fr: Il y a plus qu´à le déchiffrer.

translation.en: Turn her upside down here, boys. Turn her up--
Does that mean anything to you at all? No.
translation.fr: Ça te dit quelque chose ? Non.

translation.en: [ Deacon ] We'll figure it out back at the 'Deez. Back at the 'Deez, boys. Careful with her. Careful with her!
translation.fr: On verra ça sur notre bateau. Prenez soin d´elle.

translation.en: What about them? Do 'em both.
Torch the boat.
We have to go under!
No, I can't breathe like you!
translation.fr: Je ne respire pas comme vous.

translation.en: I'll breathe for both of us.
My boat.
What is this? Get those chains off her.
translation.fr: C´est quoi ça ? Enlevez ses chaînes. On n´est pas des barbares !

translation.en: What are we, barbarians here?
translation.fr: Enlevez ses chaînes. On n´est pas des barbares !

translation.en: Goodness gracious. Sakes alive.
Come on. Outta here, you big, nasty animal, you!
You wanna come over here and sit on my lap?
How 'bout a cigarette?
Nothin' like a good smoke if you miss your mom.
translation.fr: Rien de tel quand maman te manque.

translation.en: Never too young to start.
No. Well, I got somethin' right here I know you'd like.
translation.fr: Je sais ce que tu aimes.

translation.en: Like to draw, don't you? Huh?
Now they're yours...
if you help me with just one problem, all right?
Now that tattoo on your back-- [ Clears Throat ]
I've been told that, uh-- that's actually a map?
translation.fr: il paraît que c´est une carte ?

translation.en: It's the way to Dryland.
Now we're gettin' someplace.
Could you teach me how to read that?
translation.fr: Tu peux m´apprendre à la lire ?

translation.en: Setback.
Well, have you ever heard any of your friends talk about it?
translation.fr: Tu as entendu tes amis en parler ?

translation.en: You know, like your mommy or your pet fish? Did he say anything?
translation.fr: Tu as entendu tes amis en parler ? Ta maman ou ton petit poisson... Il a dit quelque chose ?

translation.en: You shouldn't make fun of him. He wouldn't like it.
translation.fr: Il a dit quelque chose ? Il n´aime pas qu´on se moque de lui.

translation.en: Girl, I don't give a shit what he'd like. He took out my eye.
translation.fr: Je me fous de ce qu´il aime. Il m´a fait perdre un oeil.

translation.en: And if I ever see him again,
translation.fr: Si je le revois, je lui ouvre le crâne

translation.en: I'm gonna cut open his head, and I'm gonna eat his brains!
translation.fr: Si je le revois, je lui ouvre le crâne et je mange sa cervelle.

translation.en: You think he'd like that?
You can't kill him.
He's even meaner than you are.
translation.fr: Il est plus méchant que vous.

translation.en: But he's not here. And he ain't comin'.
translation.fr: Mais il n´est pas là. Et il ne viendra pas.

translation.en: And no one's gonna save you.
He'll come for me. He will.
Then you better tell me what I wanna know,
or he can see what's left of you in a goddamn jar.
translation.fr: ou il trouvera ce qu´il reste de toi dans un bocal.

translation.en: We're going to die here, aren't we?
Aren't we?
After the atoll, when I offered myself to you,
translation.fr: Après avoir fui l´atoll, je me suis offerte à vous.

translation.en: why didn't you take me?
'Cause you didn't really want me.
Not really.
Have I been asleep long?
I was dreaming.
It's funny.
I always thought Dryland floated.
That it drifted with the wind. That's why it was so hard to find.
translation.fr: Introuvable, parce que flottant au gré du vent.

translation.en: Why did you believe in it so much?
Because we weren't made for the sea.
translation.fr: On n´est pas faits pour la mer.

translation.en: Got hands... and feet.
translation.fr: On a des pieds et des mains.

translation.en: We're supposed to walk.
I miss her sound.
Don't you?
He-- No, no, no. Helen, up here. Above you!
Smart thinking to burn your boat.
translation.fr: Bonne idée de brûler le bateau.

translation.en: Without the smoke, I never would have found you.
translation.fr: Sans la fumée, je ne vous trouvais pas. Qui c´est celui-là ?

translation.en: Who's that with you?
translation.fr: je ne vous trouvais pas. Qui c´est celui-là ?

translation.en: Ichthyus Sapien, is that really you?
I'll throw the rope down. You catch it. I'll help you climb up.
translation.fr: Je jette une corde. Attrape. Je vais t´aider.

translation.en: Helen. Where's Enola?
Smokers took her. They'd have me too if it weren't for him.
translation.fr: Chez les Smokers. Sans lui, ils m´emmenaient aussi.

translation.en: My friend, thank you. Very human of you.
translation.fr: Mon ami... Merci, c´est très humain de ta part.

translation.en: Go grab your things quickly. Quickly. Come.
[ Gregor ] You see? Right down there.
translation.fr: Regardez. Là, en bas, d´autres survivants.

translation.en: There's several of us survivors. We'll just start over again.
translation.fr: Regardez. Là, en bas, d´autres survivants. Prêts à recommencer.

translation.en: [ Man ] You can't ask us to go get her. [ Woman ] Enola's the reason we're in all this trouble. [ Woman #2 ] Forget it. We're not going.
translation.fr: - Elle n´y est pour rien. - On n´ira pas !

translation.en: [ Helen ] They don't have any reason to kill her. They need to find Dryland just like we do.
translation.fr: Ils ne la tueront pas. Ils veulent trouver Dryland !

translation.en: - Of course. - [ Helen ] If the mariner's willing to go, why not us?
translation.fr: Bien sûr... Il irait à sa recherche et pas nous ?

translation.en: [ Woman ] If he wants to go, then let him!
[ Woman #2 ] We don't want you here! You or the girl!
translation.fr: On ne veut plus de vous !

translation.en: Helen. The papers the mariner brought you--
It's the same language the tattoo is written in. They're numbers.
translation.fr: Les signes du tatouage sont dans la même langue. Ce sont des chiffres !

translation.en: [ Man ] Gregor, you're as crazy as she is! [ Woman ] We can't stay here!
translation.fr: Ce sont des chiffres ! Gregor, tu es fou toi aussi !

translation.en: We're wasting valuable time. More Smokers will come. We need to be moving now.
translation.fr: On perd un temps précieux. Les Smokers vont venir.

translation.en: My friends, don't you see we need this child if we want to find Dryland?
translation.fr: Nous avons besoin d´elle pour trouver Dryland.

translation.en: I'm not goin'. Nobody is.
[ Woman ] We've already seen their smoke on the horizon. Know what that is yet?
translation.fr: On a vu de la fumée à l´horizon !

translation.en: The numbers? Yes, I think I do.
translation.fr: - Tu sais ce que c´est ? - Je crois.

translation.en: It seems to be some ancient form of geographic location-- latitude, longitude.
translation.fr: On dirait d´anciennes coordonnées géographiques. Pourtant, ça ne veut rien dire.

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, though. The numbers, they seem to be backwards or something.
translation.fr: Pourtant, ça ne veut rien dire. Les chiffres ont l´air d´être à l´envers.

translation.en: It's upside down. The world?
translation.fr: Les chiffres ont l´air d´être à l´envers. Ils sont inversés. Le monde, les pôles

translation.en: The poles have reversed themselves?
I've been mappin' the cities below.
translation.fr: se seraient inversés ? J´ai repéré les villes en dessous.

translation.en: The world wasn't created in a deluge. It was covered by it.
translation.fr: Le déluge n´a pas créé le monde. Il l´a recouvert.

translation.en: - [ Man ] That's blasphemy! - [ Helen ] No, it's true.
I've seen it with my own eyes. There is land. It's right under our keel.
translation.fr: C´est vrai. Je l´ai vu de mes propres yeux. Il y a de la terre. Sous cette quille. Tout est immergé.

translation.en: None of it's dry anymore. Some is.
translation.fr: Sous cette quille. Tout est immergé. Pas tout.

translation.en: Enola's been there.
translation.fr: Enola y a été. Je le sais maintenant.

translation.en: I know that now. I saw what she drew.
translation.fr: Enola y a été. Je le sais maintenant. J´ai vu un de ses dessins.

translation.en: So that's why he's going after Enola-- to find Dryland.
translation.fr: C´est pour Dryland, que tu vas chercher Enola.

translation.en: I don't care about Dryland.
This is ridiculous. Going after the Smokers? He doesn't even know which direction they came from.
translation.fr: Ridicule ! Il ne sait même pas d´où ils viennent.

translation.en: [ Man ] I say let him go. [ Woman ] We're better off without them anyway!
translation.fr: Laissez-le partir. On sera mieux sans lui.

translation.en: If she's alive, I'll bring her back to you.
translation.fr: Si elle est vivante, je te la ramènerai.

translation.en: [ Woman ] Forget about the mute-o, Helen.
If he brings her back here, they'll kill us all!
translation.fr: S´il la ramène ici, ils nous tueront tous !

translation.en: I can't stand it. We gotta go help him.
I can't ask him to do this alone.
Oh, don't worry, my dear. You're not going to have to.
translation.fr: Ne t´inquiète pas. Il ne sera pas seul.

translation.en: You got that tattoo figured out yet?
It would be easier if it was flat-- big and flat.
translation.fr: Ce serait plus facile s´il était à plat. Il faut le mettre à plat.

translation.en: It needs to be flat. What you got in mind?
translation.fr: Ce serait plus facile s´il était à plat. Il faut le mettre à plat. A quoi tu penses ?

translation.en: Well, you cut it off her back. You stretch it, mount it.
translation.fr: Il faut le découper, l´étirer sur un support. On y verrait mieux.

translation.en: Give us a proper look. Take her down below until I holler.
translation.fr: l´étirer sur un support. On y verrait mieux. Tu la remonteras quand je crierai.

translation.en: Saint Joe, we're close.
translation.fr: Saint Joe, on touche au but.

translation.en: After centuries of shame.
They're gettin' ugly. Don't I know it.
Announce me, cousin.
[ Microphone Popping ] Hey. Here he is.
Rise up, brothers and sisters.
Turn your eyes and open your hearts... to your humble benefactor,
translation.fr: Levez les yeux et ouvrez vos coeurs à votre humble bienfaiteur,

translation.en: your spiritual shepherd and dictator for life,
translation.fr: votre guide spirituel et dictateur à vie...

translation.en: the Deacon of the 'Deez.
Children. Children of the provider.
Citizens of the good ship. Please now, hear me speak.
translation.fr: Citoyens de ce navire. Laissez-moi parler.

translation.en: I've had a vision. [ Man ] Yeah, we're tired of your visions!
translation.fr: J´ai eu une vision. On est fatigués de tes visions !

translation.en: What about the land you promised us?
translation.fr: Où est la terre que tu nous promets ?

translation.en: [ Deacon ] O ye of little faith.
I've had a vision so great...
translation.fr: Une vision si grandiose, que lorsqu´elle m´est apparue,

translation.en: that as it came to me, I wept.
translation.fr: Une vision si grandiose, que lorsqu´elle m´est apparue, j´ai pleuré.

translation.en: - And in this splenditudinous figment of wonder, - Is that Bone's ride?
And you know what it is that I saw.
I saw... the land.
- Horse, that you? - [ Engine Revving ]
Look, just bring it in slow, okay? I don't have all day.
Just bring it up slow.
I said slow! [ Screams ]
Shouldn't be doing that. You're gonna get in trouble.
translation.fr: C´est pas bien. Vous allez avoir des problèmes.

translation.en: Ha. That's right.
translation.fr: C´est vrai. Tu n´as pas peur.

translation.en: You're not afraid. You've got your pet freak comin' to rescue you.
translation.fr: C´est vrai. Tu n´as pas peur. Le monstre te délivrera.

translation.en: He's not a freak, and he can take you anytime.
translation.fr: C´est pas un monstre et il vous aura.

translation.en: He's killed dozens of people, and he doesn't have any mercy or anything.
translation.fr: Il a tué plein de gens. Il ne connaît pas la pitié. Il tue même les petites filles.

translation.en: He even kills little girls.
translation.fr: Il ne connaît pas la pitié. Il tue même les petites filles.

translation.en: Haven't we all?
It's Horse.
Find him. Find him! Come on!
Come on. Gettin' nervous, aren't you?
I don't get nervous.
[ Deacon ] And if there's a river, we'll dam it.
And if there's a tree, we'll ram it.
translation.fr: Une rivière, on l´endiguera ! Un arbre, on l´éperonnera.

translation.en: 'Cause I'm talkin' progress here.
translation.fr: Car c´est de progrès dont je parle !

translation.en: Yes, sir. I'm talkin' development.
translation.fr: Car c´est de progrès dont je parle ! Et de développement !

translation.en: [ Man ] Yeah! For we shall suck and savor...
the sweet flavor of Dryland.
[ Crowd Whistling ] [ Enola ] Face is all red.
Helen said with anybody that has a face that red, he's either had too much sun or too much to drink.
translation.fr: Helen dit que c´est soit le soleil, soit la boisson.

translation.en: All right, that's it. I'm gonna burn your face. Almost time.
- [ Clanging ] What's up? - We're just talkin' about our friend.
translation.fr: Je vais te brûler ! Que se passe-t-il ? On parlait de notre ami.

translation.en: [ Doctor ] What's his name? [ Enola ] He doesn't have a name.
translation.fr: Comment il s´appelle ? Il n´a pas de nom.

translation.en: So death can't find him. Nah-nah-nah.
translation.fr: La mort ne le trouve pas.

translation.en: Doesn't have a home or people to care for.
He's not afraid of anything, men least of all.
translation.fr: Il n´a peur de rien. Des hommes encore moins.

translation.en: He's fast and strong like a big wind.
translation.fr: Il est fort et rapide comme le vent.

translation.en: He can hear a hundred miles and see a hundred miles underwater.
translation.fr: Il entend et voit à des centaines de milles sous l´eau.

translation.en: [ Gagging ] He can hide in the shadow of the noon sun.
translation.fr: Il entend et voit à des centaines de milles sous l´eau. Il peut se cacher à l´ombre d´un soleil de midi.

translation.en: He could be right behind you,
and you won't even know it till you're dead!
Give it a rest.
He'll come for me. He will. [ Deacon ] We are the reason-- Yeah?
Well, I hope he does. [ Deacon ] The Lord's creation.
Remember you said that.
[ Deacon Continues ] Look at us.
Look at us here today. [ Man ] Yeah!
Dryland is not just our destination,
translation.fr: Dryland n´est pas seulement notre destination,

translation.en: - but it is our destiny! - [ Cheering, Whistling ]
translation.fr: Dryland n´est pas seulement notre destination, c´est aussi notre destinée !

translation.en: Find him. Find him!
How can I find... this glorious place?
And he said to me--
"A child shall lead you."
A child.
- And behold! - It's time.
translation.fr: Une enfant. Et voyez...! C´est le moment.

translation.en: The instrument of our salvation!
[ Deacon ] Our guide in the wild.
[ Deacon ] Our beacon in the darkness.
Turn her around, Nord.
She has shown me the path!
translation.fr: Tourne-la ! Elle m´a montré le chemin !

translation.en: And before the holy-most moment is upon us,
let's sacrifice one to old Saint Joe.
translation.fr: Et avant ce moment béni, on va en sacrifier une au vieux Saint Joe.

translation.en: And let's get this tub of shit up to speed.
- Pull. - Pull!
So which way we rowin'? I don't have a goddamn clue.
translation.fr: On rame vers où ? J´en sais fichtre rien.

translation.en: [ Laughs ] Don't worry.
translation.fr: J´en sais fichtre rien. T´inquiète pas. Ils rameront un bon mois

translation.en: They'll row for a month before they figure out I'm fakin' it.
translation.fr: T´inquiète pas. Ils rameront un bon mois avant de s´en apercevoir.

translation.en: But, um, wh-wh--
Oh, you want details. Well, I'm not tellin' these savages...
translation.fr: Tu veux des détails ? Je ne dis rien à ces sauvages pour la carte.

translation.en: that we haven't solved the map yet.
translation.fr: Je ne dis rien à ces sauvages pour la carte.

translation.en: I promised them results, and I'll get 'em if I gotta cut 'em out of her goddamn back.
translation.fr: Mais des résultats j´en aurai, même si je dois les lui arracher du dos.

translation.en: Who is that? Who is that?
Maybe one of the spare rowers?
Why aren't you rowin'?
- It's him. - It is him.
translation.fr: C´est lui. C´est lui. Ça va être votre fête.

translation.en: You guys are in so much trouble.
translation.fr: C´est lui. Ça va être votre fête.

translation.en: Well, I'll be damned. It's the gentleman guppy.
You know, he's like a turd that won't flush.
translation.fr: La merde qui ne s´évacue pas.

translation.en: I want the girl.
I thought you were stupid, friend.
translation.fr: Je te prenais pour un imbécile.

translation.en: [ Gun Cocking ] But I underestimated you.
translation.fr: Je te prenais pour un imbécile. Je t´ai sous-estimé. Tu es méchamment

translation.en: You are a total freakin' retard.
translation.fr: Je t´ai sous-estimé. Tu es méchamment attardé !

translation.en: I want the girl. That's all.
Well, what on this screwed-up earth makes you think you're gonna get her?
translation.fr: Et pourquoi bordel, je te la donnerais ?

translation.en: You know what this is?
I drop it, you burn.
We all burn. Now wait, wait, wait, wait.
[ Clears Throat ] Let's not do anything rash here.
I mean, uh, are you sure she's worth all this?
translation.fr: Pas d´imprudence. Elle en vaut la peine ?

translation.en: She never does stop talkin'. She never shuts up.
I noticed. What is it then?
Huh? It's the map.
She's my friend.
Golly gee. A single tear rolls down my cheek. I mean, you're gonna die for your friend.
translation.fr: Une larme coule le long de ma joue. Tu mourrais pour elle ?

translation.en: If it comes to that.
- He's bluffing. I'll kill him. - He's not bluffing. He never bluffs.
translation.fr: Il bluffe. Je vais le tuer. Il ne bluffe jamais !

translation.en: Shut up!
I don't-- I-I-- I don't think you're gonna drop that torch, my friend.
translation.fr: Tu ne jetteras pas ce fumigène.

translation.en: - Why not? - Because you're not crazy.
translation.fr: Et pourquoi ? Parce que tu n´es pas fou.

translation.en: Oh, thank God.
Get him!
Let's go, goddamn it!
Don't just stand there! Kill somethin'!
translation.fr: Restez pas là. Tuez n´importe quoi !

translation.en: Was this your big vision?
[ Yells ] I've always wanted to drive this monster.
There he is! There he is!
[ Laughing ] You should've stayed underwater.
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû rester sous l´eau.

translation.en: Now you know how to fly an airplane? You're lucky I do.
Ow! Now you stop it! You behave yourself now!
[ Helen ] It's going down.
You can see it sinking. Gregor, bring us right down on top of it.
translation.fr: Il s´enfonce. Il coule. Amène-nous au-dessus.

translation.en: Hurry, Gregor! [ Gregor ] Don't worry. Hurry.
Enola! Up here!
[ Gregor ] Are they on yet?
- [ Gregor ] What is it? - [ Helen ] I don't know!
translation.fr: C´est quoi ? Je ne sais pas.

translation.en: Gotcha! I'm gonna rip your cute little lungs out.
Saint Joe. Hole in one.
Oh. Oh, no! Quick! What are we gonna do?
Tie this off.
- [ Gregor ] Hurry! - Tie it!
Get 'em up now.
- [ Gregor ] Of course! North is south. - What?
translation.fr: Bien sûr ! Le nord et le sud sont inversés.

translation.en: - South is north. - I was swimming.
translation.fr: Le nord et le sud sont inversés. J´ai nagé !

translation.en: I saw. [ Gregor ] My friends.
My friends, look.
If I take a bearing from the sun and reverse the coordinates on Enola's back,
translation.fr: Si je fais le point et j´inverse les coordonnées...

translation.en: then Dryland is that way.
All of this! It's fresh!
translation.fr: De l´eau douce ! Tout ça, c´est de l´eau douce !

translation.en: I found something!
Maybe we should put them under the dirt. I think it was their way.
translation.fr: Mettons-les en terre. C´est ce qu´ils devaient faire.

translation.en: [ Gregor ] They must have known they were dying.
translation.fr: Ils ont vu la mort arriver.

translation.en: I'm home.
Where's the mariner? He was outside.
Wait. Wait! I want to show you this.
translation.fr: J´ai quelque chose à te montrer.

translation.en: First time in your life you got nothin' to say?
translation.fr: Pour une fois, tu ne dis rien ?

translation.en: Enola, I have to go now.
But you came back for me.
I like you.
Why are you leaving?
I don't belong here. I belong out there. You belong here.
translation.fr: J´appartiens à l´océan. Tu appartiens à cet endroit.

translation.en: It's too strange here. It doesn't move right.
translation.fr: Tout est étrange. Rien ne bouge normalement.

translation.en: Helen said that it's only land sickness.
translation.fr: D´après Helen, c´est le mal de terre.

translation.en: We're all feeling it. It'll go away soon.
translation.fr: On l´a tous. Il disparaîtra bientôt.

translation.en: It's more than that.
translation.fr: Il s´agit de bien autre chose.
